copies_out_of_range: The number of copies must be between 1 and {max_copies}.
start_text:
Hi! I'm Uniclon.

Options:
• Send an MP4 as a *file (Document)* with a numeric caption, e.g. 10.
• If the file is too large to upload, place it in the project folder and send the text:
  {code_example}.

Copy limit: up to {max_copies}.
I will return results from the '{output_dir}' folder.
download_too_big_hint:
The file is too large for the Telegram Bot API.
Copy the video into the project folder and send a message like:
{code_example} — I'll run the script locally.
file_not_found:
File {filename} not found in {base_dir}.
Copy the video into the project folder or send it as a file.
script_failed: An error occurred while processing the video. The script exited with code {rc}. Check the logs and the '{output_dir}' folder.
no_new_files: The script finished, but no new .mp4 files were found in '{output_dir}'.
